Pre-degree (Group I: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry) Government Arts College, Thiruvananthapuram 1990-1996. High School Christ Nagar High School, Thiruvananthapuram 1984-1990. Primary School Chinmaya Vidyalaya, Shastamangalam, Thiruvananthapuram Research My research experience so far has been primarily in combinatorics and algorithms arising from combinatorial observations. I have worked mostly in the areas of graph representations, graph colouring, partial orders, permutations, simplicial complexes and property testing.
